thread.title: More than 20 terror plots foiled in New York
thread.title_full: More than 20 terror plots foiled in New York | News24

author: news24.com
title: More than 20 terror plots foiled in New York
text:
Washington - More than 20 terror plots have been foiled in New York since the 11 September, 2001 terror attacks, according to the city's police chief on Tuesday, who said the risk of another devastating attack remains "greater than ever."
Speaking before a hearing of the House Committee on Homeland Security, New York City Police Chief Bill Bratton warned of "multiple hazards" on the terrorism front, from "lone wolf" attackers to radicalised supporters of the brand of Islam espoused by ISIS.
"Since September 11, 2001, there have been more than 20 terrorist plots against New York City," Bratton said. "So far they have been thwarted."
He added, however, that "in many respects, we currently face a greater likelihood of attack than we have seen in years," Bratton said.
